text:
Hello there,
I'm Atharva GSoC'23 and '24 mentee under R Project, looking for new job opportunities in various tech related field.
Languages known Python(Flask, FastAPI), R(Basic), Bash Script.
I'm proficient with technologies - Git, Linux, Docker, Github Actions, Kubernetes, GCP and Hugging Face.
Hardware and Electronics - known to Raspberry Pi and Pico with some sensors.

If you have openings or leads please let me know, I'm curious to learn other tech stack too. Thank you for your time.
Here is my Linkedin profile
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/atharvashirdhankar/>
